About Me

🌐 I am a passionate Frontend Developer and a Computer Science and Engineering student from Bangladesh, dedicated to building responsive and engaging web experiences. My technical expertise includes React, Next.js, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase Authentication for seamless user interaction and security. Currently, I am expanding my backend skills with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, while exploring AI and blockchain technologies.

I also have experience with C, C++, Java, and Python, along with strong knowledge in data structures, algorithms, and OOP concepts. In my free time, I solve problems on platforms like URI, HackerRank, and Codeforces, and explore Python and Linux. I enjoy reading diverse books and writing to fuel my creativity.

Contact me to explore how my skills can add value to your team or project. 🚀

ToLet Home - A Home Searching Website

This project is a web-based platform for listing rental properties, built using Next.js and integrated with Progressive Web App (PWA) features for enhanced performance and offline capabilities

EasyTech - An EdTech Website
